description.value:
This hourglass-shaped drum has two heads, each of which produces a different sound when struck. When played together, the resonance of the two sounds is effective in repelling evil spirits. This drum can be played as an instrument, granting a +2 item bonus to Performance.

Activate 2 Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect You play both heads of the drums, generating a pulse of positive energy that targets one creature within 30 feet that has the undead trait. This deals @Damage[5d8[vitality]] damage (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:28] save) to that creature; if the undead also has the ghost trait, the ghost becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1} if it fails the save.

Activate 3 Interact

Frequency once per hour

Effect You raucously play both heads of the drums, accompanied with shouting and dancing. This display generates a pulse of positive energy in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] from you. All undead creatures within this area must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28] save.

Critical Success The creature takes no damage.

Success The creature takes @Damage[2d8[vitality]] damage.

Failure The creature takes @Damage[5d8[vitality]] damage; if the creature has the ghost trait, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The creature takes @Damage[10d8[vitality]] damage; if the creature has the ghost trait, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} for 1 minute.
